mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(review_item_id, review_user_id, review_score_quality, review_score_delivery, review_score_kind, review_content) values (#{reviewItemId}, #{reviewUserId}, #{reviewScoreQuality}, #{reviewScoreDelivery}, #{reviewScoreKind}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.review_item_id, r.review_user_id, i.item_name, r.review_state, r.review_score_quality, r.review_score_delivery, r.review_score_kind, r.review_content, r.created_datetime from tbl_review r join tbl_item i on r.review_item_id = i.id where r.review_user_id = #{userId} order by r.created_datetime desc

select id, reviewItemId, reviewUserId, reviewScoreQuality, reviewScoreDelivery, reviewScoreKind, reviewContent, reviewState, createdDatetime, updatedDatetime, itemName, itemPrice, storeName, userName from vw_store_review where storeId = #{storeId} order by createdDatetime desc
limit #{criteria.count} offset #{criteria.offset}

select id, reviewItemId, reviewUserId, reviewScoreQuality, reviewScoreDelivery, reviewScoreKind, reviewContent, reviewState, createdDatetime, updatedDatetime, itemName, itemPrice, storeName, userName from vw_store_review where reviewItemId = #{itemId} order by createdDatetime desc
limit #{criteria.count} offset #{criteria.offset}
